GitHub Copilot Review 2026

Complete Analysis of Microsoft's AI Coding Assistant

What is GitHub Copilot?

GitHub Copilot is Microsoft's AI-powered coding assistant that suggests code completions and entire functions in real-time as you type. Powered by OpenAI's Codex model (based on GPT-3), Copilot integrates directly into your editor and provides contextual code suggestions.

Rating: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê 4.7/5

Best For: Developers who want fast, inline code suggestions and autocompletion
